category.name: Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Cfg0ExpressionGridColumnProperties
preference.preference_description: Specifies a list of option properties that are displayed in the Variant Expression Editor of the Product Configurator. The object ID of the option is always displayed and should not be specified in this preference. The properties should be added in the format "BusinessObject.PropertyName", where "BusinessObject" is the Business Object internal name and "PropertyName" is the property internal name. Valid Values: Any valid property value.
